title: Strange Love - Short Stories and Twisted Tales
description: Love can bring us together, but it can also tear us apart.Dive into ten very different tales all sharing the theme of love; the good, the bad and the hideously ugly. Maternal love leads to obsession, infidelity leads to heartbreak and a prince ends up very disappointed with his lot.You may have seen one or two of these characters before, but never in this light.Twisted perspectives on old tales and new stories whose characters will stay with you forever...To love is man's greatest gift, and his greatest curse.
author: Victoria  Pearson
